character.statement: Just do one con appearance, they said. We'll give you a 10k per diem, they said.
Just do one con appearance, they said. We'll give you a 10k per diem, they said.
I'm going back to Broadway!
My shield melted! I guess things weren't better in the old days.
That crystal looks ready to shatter.
What a weird, alien machine. Maybe there are more of these power containers around.
Well, they say these things give you enough energy to lift a horse.
Looks like there's room for more cans.
Wow, I can't believe that worked.
Honestly, what do they put in this stuff?
That crystal doesn't look ready to crumble just yet.
I did it! I banished Omegon!
The hour is at hand, my faithful hench-bots.
Soon, the powers of the Mighty Action Force will be mine!
We shall discard their withered husks on the trash heap of history.
This world, like so many wretched spheres before it, will be reborn in the light of Omegon!
No one can face us. Not the Mighty Action Force, not some random kid in a hot dog suit.
Make ready, my servants. Your glory awaits.
Mmmm, I love this chair's massage feature.
Is it getting brighter in here, maybe louder, or is it just me?
What was that noise?!
What was that noise?!
You didn't think it would be that easy, did you?
Now I will show you real power!
My Lord Omegon, be careful!
